notes: First Tesla production vehicle. Based on Lotus Elise chassis. 53 kWh battery pack. 400V architecture. 0-60 mph in 3.7 seconds. 244-mile range. Proved viability of electric sports cars. Limited production (~2,450 units). Hand-built in limited quantities. Early EV technology requires specialized vintage EV expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Tesla Roadster (first generation) article, January 2025 revision.
